recipe.title: Rouille
ingredients: 3/4 cup coarse fresh bread crumbs (preferably from a baguette, crust removed)
instructions: Pour water over bread crumbs in a bowl. Mash garlic to a paste with sea salt and cayenne using a mortar and pestle. Add moistened bread crumbs and mash into garlic paste.
Add oil in a slow stream, mashing and stirring vigorously with pestle until combined well.
